scripts.build-all-dev: yarn run build-dderl-dev && yarn run build-swagger-dev
scripts.build-all-prod: yarn run build-dderl-prod && yarn run build-swagger-prod
scripts.build-dderl-prod: cd dev/ && yarn && yarn build-prod && cd .. && rimraf dev
scripts.build-swagger-prod: cd swagger/ && yarn && yarn build-prod && cd .. && rimraf swagger
